page.title: 09THE COUNTY ECHO
page.content: The County Echo is Fishguard and Goodwick's local newspaper. It also covers the outlying districts of the area. So the paper is also known as the St Davids City Chronicle. The main office is in Fishguard but it has another office in St Davids. Eight people work on the paper. Papers are sold through about 56 different shops in the areas covered by the paper. The paper is printed on Monday and comes out on a Tuesday. Each day stories are reported. Advertisements are also included. The first headline the paper ever carried was the arrival at Fishguard Harbour of the ocean liner Mauritania.
